scripts.build: yarn --cwd ./frontend/ build && echo moving ./frontend/build to ./backend/build && rm -rf ./backend/build && mv ./frontend/build ./backend/
scripts.dev: gnome-terminal --tab -- bash -c 'yarn --cwd ./frontend/ start' && gnome-terminal --tab -- bash -c 'yarn --cwd ./backend/ dev'
scripts.devWin: start powershell -NoExit -Command "yarn --cwd ./frontend/ start " && start powershell -NoExit -Command "yarn --cwd ./backend/ dev "
scripts.devInstall: gnome-terminal --tab -- bash -c 'cd ./frontend/ && yarn install' && gnome-terminal --tab -- bash -c 'cd ./backend/ && yarn install'
scripts.devInstallWin: start powershell -Command "cd ./frontend/ && yarn install " && start powershell -Command " cd ./backend/ && yarn install "
